dict.string:
THE BIG BAD BOY OF
 BOMBS! YOU ONLY NEED
 ONE OF THESE TO CLEAR THE
 BATTLEFIELD AND CLAIM THE
 SPOILS OF WAR! JUST TELL
 US WHERE TO DROP IT!

FREEZE THE WORLE!

 THE MAGIC IN THIS ROD WILL
 FREZE ALL BADDIES AND
 PREVENT NEW ONES FROM
 APPROACHING

BLAST YOUR ENEMIES TO
 PLECES WITH THESE
 SPECIALLY DESIGNED
 GNOME EXPLOSIVES.

 DESTRUCTION GUARANTEED.

THIS SPECIAL CONCOCTION
 WILL FREEZE YOUR ENEMIES
 HELPLESS IN PLACE FOR A
 WHILE

MAGICAL HEARTS TRAPPED
 IN A BOX.

 BREAK GLASS IN AN
 EMERGENCY TO GAIN 5
 EXTRA LIVES.

LEAVE NOTHING TO CHANCE.
 BRING EXTRA GOLD TO THE
 BATTLEFIELD!

 EACH BIG WORTH 500
 GOLD PIECES.
